channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bedding dumped, 21st December
item.description:
Could it be removed plse? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lynton Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Boycott Israeli Apartheid stickers along street, 21st December
item.description:
Anti Israel stickers stuck on every single lamppost along Lordship Park until the junction with Queen Elizabeth Drive. Creates atmosphere of intimidation/division in this area. Appeared last week. Unpleasant for this community. Can they be removed?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lordship Park, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road is blocked by bollards, 21st December
item.description:
Here, I believe Millwall block the road with bollards covering around 20 meters in distance. I was wondering what the legalities of this are and can I as a resident just leave bollard outside my house so no one can park here?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elstree Hill, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
